short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds custom HashFlag to the tweets containing #MahsaAmini, #مهسا_امینی, #opIran and #اعتصابات_سراسری

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds custom HashFlag to the tweets containing #MahsaAmini, #مهسا_امینی, #opIran and #اعتصابات_سراسری, #IranRevolution & #IranRevolution2022. Shows Hashflag on genuine hashtags on Twitter suggestion box on composing a new tweet. Also supports Tweetdeck.

Tweet Deck Only: You can also insert hashtags using keyboard shortcut ctrl + shift + (1 to 6)

This project is open source and you can find the source code from the Github repository.
We do not track any of your personal data. This extension only scans your timeline and flag the hashtags.
